price: Sε wodane woho fri (obusuani anaa ohiani anaa ͻkwantuni no) ho de hwehwε wo Wura hͻ ahummͻbrͻ a wanida soͻ no a, ka asεm a emu dwoͻ kyerε wͻn.
arabic: وَإِمَّا تُعۡرِضَنَّ عَنۡهُمُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رَحۡمَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكَ تَرۡجُوهَا فَقُل لَّهُمۡ قَوۡلٗا مَّيۡسُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-immā tuʿ'riḍanna ʿanhumu ib'tighāa raḥmatin min rabbika tarjūhā faqul lahum qawlan maysūran
